text: Lake Thun are included in your Swiss Travel Pass. Chateau de Chillon by Lake Geneva near Montreux is one of my favourites. I hope this post has helped you in the process of deciding whether or not you should buy a Swiss Travel Pass. Happy planning and good luck making your decision.
